name: MovieSuggester
0:
”Alexa, open Movie Suggester.”
”Alexa, open Movie Suggester for movies”
”Alexa, open Movie Suggester and tv series”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: movie suggester
des:
Movie Suggestion Engine - Great way to get new movie or TV series suggestions. It make recommendations based on a genre (type) specified or another movie or series that you enjoyed previously.

You can also use this app to get the details of any movie or series you can think of!

You can interact with the app the following ways:

- Alexa, Open Movie Suggester

- Alexa, Open Movie Suggester for genre
- Alexa, Open Movie Suggester for action movies
- Alexa, Open Movie Suggester for Christmas movies

- Alexa, Open Movie Suggester for movies
- Alexa, Open Movie Suggester for movies similar to Taken
- Alexa, Open Movie Suggester and suggest a movie like Toy Story

- Alexa, Open Movie Suggester for tv series
- Alexa, Open Movie Suggester and get tv series like breaking bad

- Alexa, Open Movie Suggester and get movie details for Interstellar
- Alexa, Open Movie Suggester for details for Forrest Gump
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
